DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Move the vessel to a new depth, independent of its movement in horizontal directions.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>depthType</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Target depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Indicates how the target depth will be specified.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Specified target depth:</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Surfaced;Periscope depth;Maximum rated depth;Sea floor;Specified target depth:</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>goalDepth</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Target depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Target depth of keel</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>depthRate</myVariableName> <myType>rate</myType> <myLabel>Ascent/descent rate</myLabel> <myToolTip>The rate to change depth. Always positive.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0.1388888888888889</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>27.777777777777779</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
